member.name: T:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.CustomProcessor
member.summary: Custom processor for a component or prefab. Can be used to change the modifications that are applied to a nested prefab.

member.name: F:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.CustomProcessor.Type
member.summary: The target component type to which this processor should be applied. Use 'Prefab' in order to apply the processor for all components in a prefab.

member.name: P:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ApplyPool.Count
member.summary: The number of entries (prefab assets) in the apply pool.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ApplyPool.Clear
member.summary: Clears all entries in the apply pool.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ApplyPool.GetSortedQueue
member.summary: Returns all prefabs in the queue ordered by depth.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ApplyPool.Add(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the prefab to the pool.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ApplyPool.AddRecursive(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Adds all Prefab components on the transform and all its children to the pool.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Patch.RemovePrefabConnection(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab)
member.summary: Removes the prefab connection.

member.summary: Overwrites the GUID in the prefab with the new GUID.

member.summary: Applies the patch to the prefab.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Patch.ApplyRecursive(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab,UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Applies the patch to the transform and all its children recursively.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Patch.ApplyToGuid(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab,UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Applies the patch to the GUID of the transform. Ignored if there is no GUID component on the Transform.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Patch.ApplyToPrefab(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab,UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Applies the patch to the Prefab of the transform. Ignored if there is no Prefab component on the Transform.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Patch.ReplaceGuidInOverrides(UnityEngine.Transform,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all occurrences of the GUID value in all Prefab Overrides components on all parents of the transform.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.SerializedObjectExtensions.UpdateIfRequired(UnityEditor.SerializedObject)
member.summary: Compatibility method for UpdateIfRequiredOrScript because it has different names between Unity versions.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ModelPostprocessor.SetModelModifications(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab,UnityEngine.Transform,VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Guid[])
member.summary: Checks the model prefab for any modifications made compared to the original model asset and marks the modifications with the ModelModification flag.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ModelPostprocessor.SetModelComponentModifications(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab,UnityEngine.Transform,VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Guid[])
member.summary: Checks the model prefab for components added to the game objects of the original asset. These added components will be marked with the ModelComponentModification flag so they are ignored when reloading changes from the asset. If the flag is not added the components will be removed when reloading the asset.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ModelPostprocessor.FindModelObject(UnityEngine.Transform,VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Prefab,VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Guid[])
member.summary: Finds the transform in the original model asset of the prefab. Searches based on object GUID.
member.param: Transform to find in the asset
Parent prefab of the tranform
Collection of GUID components in the asset

member.param: Transform to find in the asset
Parent prefab of the tranform
Collection of GUID components in the asset

member.name: P:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.NestedPrefabsPostprocessor.IsEnabled
member.summary: Is the post processor enabled? When disabled, prefabs will still be processed and validated, but no changes will be applied to nested prefabs in the project. The postprocessor will be disabled while installing and when restoring the prefab database after building.

member.name: P:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.NestedPrefabsPostprocessor.IsDestroyed
member.summary: Is the post processor destroyed? When destroyed, all postprocess operations will be ignored. The postprocessor will be destroyed when uninstalling Nested Prefabs.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ReferenceCollectionUtility.Update(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ReferenceCollection)
member.summary: Updates the reference collection. Makes sure there are no prefab overrides in the collection. When a child of a prefab is deleted in Unity and applied, the array element that used to contain a reference to that child will be marked as overridden.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ReferenceCollectionUtility.UpdateRecursive(VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.ReferenceCollection)
member.summary: Updates the reference collection and all reference collections of nested prefabs in the prefab's hierarchy.

member.name: P:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Comparing.ObjectInfo.IncludeNestedChildren
member.summary: Should nested prefabs be included in this ObjectInfo's data? If set to false no children will be cached in nested prefabs but the nested prefab itself will still be included.

member.name: P:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Comparing.ObjectInfo.NestedPrefab
member.summary: The nested prefab component on this object. Null if the object is not a nested prefab.

member.summary: The topmost prefab in the entire hierarchy.

member.summary: Is this object the root of a prefab or nested prefab?

member.name: P:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Comparing.ObjectInfo.OverridesOnly
member.summary: Is this object only cached because it has overridden components? If true all other components have to be ignored and only the overridden components have to be cached.

member.summary: The reference object is a prefab asset.

member.summary: The referenced object is an instance of a non-GameObject Object (ScriptableObject, Texture, Material, etc.).

member.summary: The referenced object is a non-GameObject asset (ScriptableObject, Texture, Material, etc.).

member.name: F:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Comparing.ObjectReferenceType.SceneObject
member.summary: The referenced object is an object in the scene outside of the prefab hierarchy.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildMenu.ValidatePreprocessBuild
member.summary: Checks if the project is in build mode and enables the Import prefab database option.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildMenu.ValidatePostprocessBuild
member.summary: Checks if the project is in build mode and enables the Import prefab database option.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildPostprocessor.PostprocessBuildFull
member.summary: Restores the prefabs by copying the backup files back into the project.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildPreprocessor.OnPreprocessBuild
member.summary: Preprocesses the project for a build.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildPreprocessor.RemoveInternalComponentsFromAssets(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes all internal components from assets in the project.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildPreprocessor.PreprocessBuild(System.String)
member.summary: Preprocesses the project for a build.
member.param: Only processes assets in this path. Use string.Empty to process the entire project.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildPreprocessor.HasWriteAccess
member.summary: Checks if the application has write access to the Library folder.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildPreprocessor.PreprocessBuildFull(System.String)
member.summary: Does a full export of the Prefab Database (makes a backup copy of every prefab and model file).

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildUtility.IsInBuildMode
member.summary: Checks if the project is in build mode.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildUtility.PreprocessCloudBuild
member.summary: Preprocesses the project for building with Unity Cloud Build. Will remove all components added by the Nested Prefabs extension from the Asset Database. Does not create any backup data and does not support restoring the removed data.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildUtility.PreprocessBuild
member.summary: Preprocesses the project for a regular build. Will remove all components added by the Nested prefab extension from the Asset Database. Stores the removed components and all prefab connections on disk so the data can be restored after building.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildUtility.PostprocessBuild
member.summary: Postprocesses the project after building. Will restore all removed components and prefab connection from disk.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildUtility.SetIsPreprocessed(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets if the current project is preprocessed for a build.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Prefabs.Building.BuildUtility.RemovePrefabDatabase
member.summary: Removes the prefab database from the project. Will delete all stored data/components on assets in this project.
